data.name: NASCAR Heat 3 - October Pack
data.detailed_description:
The NASCAR Heat 3 October DLC includes 43 new paint schemes from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, many of which are "Throwback" schemes. Also included are 10 schemes from the NASCAR XFINITY Series, 9 from the NASCAR Camping World Truck Series, 3 new Challenges, and MRN announcer Alex Hayden spotter audio!

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Kyle Larson, DC Solar Throwback
Kyle Busch, Skittles Throwback

NXS:
Christopher Bell, Rheem Throwback
Kevin Harvick, Hunt Brothers Pizza Throwback

NCWTS:
Johnny Sauter, ISM Connect (Patriotic)
Grant Enfinger, CURB Records

Plus many more!

data.short_description: The NASCAR Heat 3 October DLC includes 43 new paint schemes from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, many of which are "Throwback" schemes. Also included are 10 schemes from the NASCAR XFINITY Series, 9 from the NASCAR Camping World Truck Series, 3 new Challenges, and Alex Hayden spotter audio!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better, Nvidia GTX460 or better, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better
